attributes.action: force fuel companies to reduce the cost of fuel by the same percentage as Brent Crude oil has dropped.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I notice with interest Brent crude price is now @$105.95 a drop of 27% form its $1.45 high. I also note petrol/diesel hasn't dropped by anywhere near 27% or diesel would be £0.97 litre. I realise the $ has rallied but not by that much. Force the fuel companies to drop there prices.
